CHOOSE YOUR ICON


Map Controls

Left Click on Map

Brings Reference Marker to the center of the map

Left Click + Drag on Map

Move the map around your viewport

Right Click on Map

Create custom marker at the cursor location

Left Click + Drag on Reference Marker

Move the reference marker around your screen. Once you stop dragging, the coordinates will display

Left Click on Reference Marker

Copy the current coordinates at your cursor to your clipboard

Right click on Reference Marker

Opens the Coordinate input. Enter coords copied and click go to pan to coordinates.

Left Click on Custom Marker

Brings up choice to rename or delete

Left Click on Ruin

Toggle visited status for ruins, saves to your browser

Custom Markers
